itunes:title: Humans are... Trees? - Tree of Life E1
itunes:author: jon collins, tim mackie
itunes:summary: Humans are like trees. This might seem strange to us until we see how the Hebrew Bible ties them together with the same keywords, images, and scenes. Humans and trees are found together at most of the hinge points in the biblical story. Listen in as Tim and Jon discuss the parallel lives of trees and humans in the Bible.
itunes:subtitle: Humans are like trees. This might seem strange to us until we see how the Hebrew Bible ties them together with the same keywords, images, and scenes. Humans and trees are found together at most of the hinge points in the biblical story. Listen in as Tim and Jon discuss the parallel lives of trees and humans in the Bible.
itunes:keywords: trees, jon collins, spirit, creation story, christianity, tree of good and evil, bible, tim mackie, tree of life, spirituality, bible project, genesis, tree
